name: Horror Cartridge Collection
description:
Horror Cartridge Collection is a set of short horror games in the PSX/DS style. Experience a range of horror settings and mechanics in short games bundled together.

  • Retro effects can be adjusted and turned off in the settings.
  • Controller support included
  • Multi-language support (Languages other than English are auto translated and may not be 100% accurate)
Cartridge 1 - Out Of Gas - Out Now!

Your car has just run out of gas in the middle of nowhere. A sign tells you a gas station is only two miles up the road. Make your way to it on foot.

A short first person walk down a dark road at night. 

  • 7 Endings
  • Average 7 minutes to finish
Cartridge 2 Coming Soon! Join The Discord Server
